sentences.sContent: The energy of the particles and the fields in the magnetosphere can vary by large amounts.
sentences.sContent_eng: The energy of the particles and the fields in the magnetosphere can vary by large amounts.
sentences.sCn: 带电粒子的能量大小与磁气圈中的磁场的大小变化极大。

sentences.sContent: The movie almost gets this one right—Earth’s magnetosphere does protect us from blasts of subatomic particles from the sun.
sentences.sContent_eng: The movie almost gets this one right—Earth’s magnetosphere does protect us from blasts of subatomic particles from the sun.
sentences.sCn: 影片在这点上倒是说对了，地球的磁气圈确实保护我们免受太阳风中亚原子颗粒的直击。

sentences.sContent: The rate at which the solar wind transfers energy to the magnetosphere can vary widely, but what determines the rate of energy transfer is unclear.
sentences.sContent_eng: The rate at which the solar wind transfers energy to the magnetosphere can vary widely, but what determines the rate of energy transfer is unclear.
sentences.sCn: 太阳风将能量转化至磁气圈的速率变化很大。 但是目前为止，我们仍不清楚到底是什么在决定着这种传送速率。

trans.tranOther: the region surrounding a planet, such as the earth, in which the behaviour of charged particles is controlled by the planet's magnetic field
